A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Easily the best Star Wars since the original trilogy\, it's not even close.  The story was character-driven. You did not get a hundred different Muppets or droids you didn't need. The action actually moves the story along instead of stalling it. It's a little funny\, a little touching\,  a little \"oh hey man that's cool.\" But most importantly it's a solid movie\,  it's a solid movie that happens to take place in the Star Wars universe\,  and does not seem to try and live up to some preconceived notion of what a Star Wars movie needs to be.
